name: part_001
file: tmp_【 #ReGLOSS3Dライブ 】Sakura Mirage ⧸ 新曲サクラミラージュ披露！【 ミニライブ 】 [qc2owX4GFwA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Introductory sequence showcasing the large crowd at the outdoor concert venue with dramatic stage lighting.
A helicopter flies over a sprawling city landscape, passing by the Cover Corp building. An elevator inside the building ascends to the 60th floor.
ReGLOSS arrives at the concert venue by helicopter. Juufuutei Raden is seen in the cockpit winking at the camera before the group lands on the stage.
ReGLOSS performs their song "Shunkan Heartbeat" on the main stage.

subtitles.original:
瞬間ハートビート
作詞: OHTORA 作曲: OHTORA / maeshima soshi
編曲: maeshima soshi
subtitles.english:
Shunkan Heartbeat
Lyrics: OHTORA / Composition: OHTORA, maeshima soshi
Arrangement: maeshima soshi

subtitles.original: 漠然と Step up, Van!
subtitles.english: Vaguely stepping up, Van!

subtitles.original: 欲していたい Fan!
subtitles.english: Wanting to be a fan!

subtitles.original: 日常に違和感
subtitles.english: A sense of discomfort in daily life

subtitles.original: うんざりしていた
subtitles.english: I was getting sick of it

subtitles.original: 見慣れたり 聞いたりの 眺め
subtitles.english: Scenes I've seen and heard so often

subtitles.original: 理屈を超える 変化を求めていた
subtitles.english: I was seeking a change that defies logic

subtitles.original: 窮屈で 退屈な 日々の中
subtitles.english: In the middle of cramped and boring days

subtitles.original: 突然 君が現れた
subtitles.english: Suddenly, you appeared

subtitles.original: 全身の細胞 駆け巡るように
subtitles.english: Like racing through every cell in my body

subtitles.original: 走り出した 未完成なストーリー
subtitles.english: An incomplete story has started to run

subtitles.original: モノクロだった 景色が今
subtitles.english: The scenery that used to be monochrome

subtitles.original: 君と出会い カラフルに彩る 万有
subtitles.english: Met you and colored the universe colorfully

subtitles.original: 心 奪われて
subtitles.english: My heart was stolen away

subtitles.original: 気まぐれな 瞬間ハートビート
subtitles.english: A whimsical, momentary heartbeat

subtitles.original: ドラマチックな 狭間
subtitles.english: In a dramatic interval

subtitles.original: もう一人じゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: きらめく 星
subtitles.english: A twinkling star

subtitles.original: 描く 未来 予想図は
subtitles.english: The blueprint of the future I draw

subtitles.original: 同じ 夢を 引き寄せたいの
subtitles.english: I want to pull in the same dream

subtitles.original: 果てしない 旅路の 向こうで
subtitles.english: Beyond the endless journey

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まない ロマンが 待っている
subtitles.english: An unceasing romance is waiting

subtitles.original: 刻んだ 時には Make it
subtitles.english: Make it in the time we've carved

subtitles.original: Can't be without you
subtitles.english: Can't be without you

subtitles.original: いつまでも 君と 一緒なら
subtitles.english: As long as I'm with you forever

subtitles.original: ここから先 広がる 宇宙
subtitles.english: The universe spreading out from here on

subtitles.original: 晴れ渡る 空 飛び出して
subtitles.english: Fly out into the clear sky

subtitles.original: 気分は 上々 想像 以上
subtitles.english: Feeling great, beyond imagination

subtitles.original: 貴重な 黒は 終わりに して
subtitles.english: Put an end to the precious black

subtitles.original: すべて 叶え あおぞらごと
subtitles.english: Grant it all, along with the blue sky

subtitles.original: 時計の 針が 回り 回る
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock turn and turn

subtitles.original: 限られた 瞬間
subtitles.english: Limited moments
